resources.string:
If you are having trouble receiving Cadpage alerts on a Samsung device, see http://www.cadpage.org/faq/cadpage-2-0
 Updated 03/16/2019

 v2.1.3-1
 Added some new features to help users with complicated notification setups.

 General Fixes:
 Some specialized initialization checking was being skipped when Cadpage is launched from the Capage widget.
